tr.td: If measured, include enough food consumption information to document any effects observed, or as necessary to explain effects on body weight.

g:HTMLPanel.div: Table 6. Food Consumption (g/kg bw/day) in the Estrogen Agonist Assaya

tbl:FSTRA2FlexTableButtons2.note: * Significantly different from controls at p<0.05. ** Significantly different from controls at p<0.01.

g:HTMLPanel.div:
Data were obtained from page
of the study report. N= No. of animals in the group.SD = Standard Deviation.
Note: At minimum report for first and last days and body weight gain for the overall study.
